exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing K' : forall x : K, abs x = 0 -> x = zero H : R -> Prop Unable to unify "let (sort, _, _) := ?U in sort" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball 0 eps y -> (fun x : R => (fun u : R => 0 < u) x -> H x) y".
In environment K : AbsRing K' : forall x : K, abs x = 0 -> x = zero H : R -> Prop H0 : at_right 0 H Unable to unify "Prop" with "filtermap abs (locally' zero) H".

In environment K : AbsRing K' : forall x : K, abs x = 0 -> x = zero H : R -> Prop H0 : at_right 0 H Unable to unify "?M2365 = zero" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : AbsRing_UniformSpace K, ball zero eps y -> (fun x : AbsRing_UniformSpace K => (fun y0 : AbsRing_UniformSpace K => y0 <> zero) x -> (fun x0 : K => H (abs x0)) x) y".

original: intros K H. apply filterlim_locally. intros x Hx. apply H. apply abs_eq_zero. apply Hx.
